function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective quarantine measures","Impact":"Increase in the number of infected humans, prolonged duration of the COVID-19 outbreak","Mitigation":"Ensure sufficient implementation intensity of quarantine measures, timely intervention, and strict adherence to measures","Technologies":"Geographical spread models, simulation experiments","People":"Residents, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
